column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'm ashamed to admit that Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba was my first tapas experience
column2: however I was not disappointed!  Everything we tried was great
column3: and the sangria is positively to die for!  It did seem a little expensive
column4: but the food was worth it.  The atmosphere
column6: was not too great.  Despite making reservations we had one of the crappiest tables in the house
column7: right next to the smoldering kitchen and next to the walkway to the rest of the restaurant so people kept knocking my chair every time they walked by.  It definitely won't stop me from going back to Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba
column8: but I know now to ask for a table away from the kitchen.
